control.comment: Enable configuration steps and specify sequence order

boundaries.comment: Configure Site Boundaries if not set to AD discovery-automatic

clientoptions.comment: Configure Default Client Push Installation settings

dpgroup.name: All Distribution Points
dpgroup.comment: All DP servers throughout the organization

roleoption.name: AddProducts
roleoption.params: Windows Server Manager - Windows Server Update Services (WSUS) Dynamic Installer

query.name: Contoso - Serial, MAC and Hostname
query.comment: Serial Number, MAC address and Hostname for all Devices
query.expression: select distinct SMS_R_System.Name, SMS_G_System_SYSTEM_ENCLOSURE.SerialNumber, SMS_G_System_NETWORK_ADAPTER.MACAddress, SMS_G_System_NETWORK_ADAPTER_CONFIGURATION.IPEnabled from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_SYSTEM_ENCLOSURE on SMS_G_System_SYSTEM_ENCLOSURE.ResourceID = SMS_R_System.ResourceId inner join SMS_G_System_NETWORK_ADAPTER on SMS_G_System_NETWORK_ADAPTER.ResourceID = SMS_R_System.ResourceId inner join SMS_G_System_NETWORK_ADAPTER_CONFIGURATION on SMS_G_System_NETWORK_ADAPTER_CONFIGURATION.ResourceID = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_NETWORK_ADAPTER_CONFIGURATION.IPEnabled = 1 and SMS_G_System_NETWORK_ADAPTER.MACAddress not like '' order by SMS_R_System.Name

query.name: Contoso - Windows Server Features
query.expression: select distinct SMS_G_System_SERVER_FEATURE.Name from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_SERVER_FEATURE on SMS_G_System_SERVER_FEATURE.ResourceID = SMS_R_System.ResourceId order by SMS_G_System_SERVER_FEATURE.Name

query.name: Contoso - Client IP Gateways
query.expression: select distinct SMS_G_System_NETWORK_ADAPTER_CONFIGURATION.DefaultIPGateway from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_NETWORK_ADAPTER_CONFIGURATION on SMS_G_System_NETWORK_ADAPTER_CONFIGURATION.ResourceID = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_NETWORK_ADAPTER_CONFIGURATION.DefaultIPGateway != '' order by SMS_G_System_NETWORK_ADAPTER_CONFIGURATION.DefaultIPGateway

query.name: Contoso - Windows 10 1703 clients
query.expression: select * from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM on SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM.ResourceId = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM.BuildNumber = '15063'

query.name: Contoso - Windows 10 1607 clients
query.expression: select * from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM on SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM.ResourceId = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM.BuildNumber = '14393'

query.name: Contoso - Windows 10 1511 clients
query.expression: select * from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM on SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM.ResourceId = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM.BuildNumber = '10586'

collection.name: Users - Title - Research Analysts
collection.comment: Users by Job Title: Research Analyst
collection.rule: select SMS_R_USER.ResourceID,SMS_R_USER.ResourceType,SMS_R_USER.Name,SMS_R_USER.UniqueUserName,SMS_R_USER.WindowsNTDomain from SMS_R_User where sms_R_User.title = 'Research Analyst'

collection.name: Users - Title - Sales Managers
collection.comment: Users by Job Title: Sales Manager
collection.rule: select distinct SMS_R_User.ResourceId, SMS_R_User.ResourceType, SMS_R_User.Name, SMS_R_User.UniqueUserName, SMS_R_User.WindowsNTDomain from SMS_R_User where SMS_R_User.title = 'Sales Manager'

collection.name: Users - Title - Solutions Architects
collection.comment: Users by Job Title: Solutions Architect
collection.rule: select distinct SMS_R_User.ResourceId, SMS_R_User.ResourceType, SMS_R_User.Name, SMS_R_User.UniqueUserName, SMS_R_User.WindowsNTDomain from SMS_R_User where SMS_R_User.title = 'Solutions Architect'

collection.name: Clients - Servers - All Windows Servers
collection.rule: select distinct SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM on SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM.ResourceId = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM.Name like '%Server%'

collection.name: Clients - Servers - 2016
collection.rule: select distinct SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM on SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM.ResourceId = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM.Name like '%Server 2016%'

collection.name: Clients - Servers - 2012 R2
collection.comment: Server clients with Windows Server 2012 R2
collection.rule: select distinct SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM on SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM.ResourceId = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM.Name like '%Server 2012 R2%'

collection.name: Clients - Servers - 2012
collection.rule: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID, SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType, SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name, SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_System.OperatingSystemNameandVersion, SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup, SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where SMS_R_System.OperatingSystemNameandVersion like 'Microsoft Windows NT Server 6.2%' OR SMS_R_System.OperatingSystemNameandVersion like 'Microsoft Windows NT Advanced Server 6.2%'

collection.name: Clients - Servers - 2008 R2
collection.comment: Server clients with Windows Server 2008 R2
collection.rule: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID, SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType, SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name, SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_System.OperatingSystemNameandVersion, SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup, SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where SMS_R_System.OperatingSystemNameandVersion like 'Microsoft Windows NT Server 6.1%' OR SMS_R_System.OperatingSystemNameandVersion like 'Microsoft Windows NT Advanced Server 6.1%'

collection.name: Clients - Servers - 2008
collection.rule: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID, SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType, SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name, SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_System.OperatingSystemNameandVersion, SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup, SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where SMS_R_System.OperatingSystemNameandVersion like 'Microsoft Windows NT Server 6.0%' OR SMS_R_System.OperatingSystemNameandVersion like 'Microsoft Windows NT Advanced Server 6.0%'

collection.name: Clients - Servers - 2003
collection.rule: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID, SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType, SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name, SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_System.OperatingSystemNameandVersion, SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup, SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where SMS_R_System.OperatingSystemNameandVersion like 'Microsoft Windows NT Server 5.2%' OR SMS_R_System.OperatingSystemNameandVersion like 'Microsoft Windows NT Advanced Server 5.2%'

collection.name: Clients - Servers - Dell
collection.rule: select distinct SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM on SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM.ResourceID = SMS_R_System.ResourceId inner join SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM on SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM.ResourceID = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM.Manufacturer = 'Dell' and SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM.Name like '%Server%'

collection.name: Clients - Servers - HP
collection.rule: select distinct SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM on SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM.ResourceID = SMS_R_System.ResourceId inner join SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM on SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM.ResourceID = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM.Manufacturer = 'Hewlett-Packard' and SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM.Name like '%Server%'

collection.name: Clients - Servers - Lenovo
collection.rule: select distinct SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM on SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM.ResourceID = SMS_R_System.ResourceId inner join SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM on SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM.ResourceID = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM.Manufacturer = 'Lenovo' and SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM.Name like '%Server%'

collection.name: Clients - Server Role - File Servers
collection.rule: select distinct SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_SERVER_FEATURE on SMS_G_System_SERVER_FEATURE.ResourceId = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_SERVER_FEATURE.Name = 'File and Storage Services'

collection.name: Clients - Server Role - Web Servers
collection.rule: select distinct SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_SERVER_FEATURE on SMS_G_System_SERVER_FEATURE.ResourceId = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_SERVER_FEATURE.Name = 'Web Server (IIS)'

collection.name: Clients - Server Role - WSUS Servers
collection.rule: select distinct SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_SERVER_FEATURE on SMS_G_System_SERVER_FEATURE.ResourceId = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_SERVER_FEATURE.Name = 'WSUS Services'

collection.name: Clients - Workstations - All Windows Workstations
collection.rule: select distinct SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM on SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM.ResourceId = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM.Name not like '%Server%'

collection.name: Clients - Workstations - Windows 10
collection.rule: select distinct SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM on SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM.ResourceId = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM.Name like 'Microsoft Windows 10%'

collection.name: Clients - Workstations - Windows 8.1
collection.rule: select distinct SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM on SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM.ResourceId = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM.Name like 'Microsoft Windows 8.1%'

collection.name: Clients - Workstations - Windows 7
collection.rule: select distinct SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM on SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM.ResourceId = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM.Name like 'Microsoft Windows 7%'

collection.name: Clients - Workstations - Dell
collection.rule: select distinct SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM on SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM.ResourceID = SMS_R_System.ResourceId inner join SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM on SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM.ResourceID = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM.Manufacturer = 'Dell' and SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM.Name not like '%Server%'

collection.name: Clients - Workstations - HP
collection.rule: select distinct SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM on SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM.ResourceID = SMS_R_System.ResourceId inner join SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM on SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM.ResourceID = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM.Manufacturer = 'Hewlett-Packard' and SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM.Name not like '%Server%'

collection.name: Clients - Workstations - Lenovo
collection.rule: select distinct SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM on SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM.ResourceID = SMS_R_System.ResourceId inner join SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM on SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM.ResourceID = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM.Manufacturer = 'Lenovo' and SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM.Name not like '%Server%'

collection.name: Clients - Servers - SQL Server 2008
collection.rule: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID, SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType, SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name, SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier, SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup, SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where SMS_R_System.ResourceId in (select distinct SMS_G_System_ADD_REMOVE_PROGRAMS.ResourceID from SMS_G_System_ADD_REMOVE_PROGRAMS where SMS_G_System_ADD_REMOVE_PROGRAMS.DisplayName = 'Microsoft SQL Server 2008')

collection.name: Clients - Servers - SQL Server 2012
collection.rule: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID, SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType, SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name, SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier, SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup, SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where SMS_R_System.ResourceId in (select distinct SMS_G_System_ADD_REMOVE_PROGRAMS.ResourceID from SMS_G_System_ADD_REMOVE_PROGRAMS where SMS_G_System_ADD_REMOVE_PROGRAMS.DisplayName = 'Microsoft SQL Server 2012')

collection.name: Clients - Servers - SQL Server 2014
collection.rule: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID, SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType, SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name, SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier, SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup, SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where SMS_R_System.ResourceId in (select distinct SMS_G_System_ADD_REMOVE_PROGRAMS.ResourceID from SMS_G_System_ADD_REMOVE_PROGRAMS where SMS_G_System_ADD_REMOVE_PROGRAMS.DisplayName = 'Microsoft SQL Server 2014')

collection.name: Clients - Servers - SQL Server 2016
collection.rule: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID, SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType, SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name, SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier, SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup, SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where SMS_R_System.ResourceId in (select distinct SMS_G_System_ADD_REMOVE_PROGRAMS.ResourceID from SMS_G_System_ADD_REMOVE_PROGRAMS where SMS_G_System_ADD_REMOVE_PROGRAMS.DisplayName = 'Microsoft SQL Server 2016')

mtask.name: Check Application Title with Inventory Information
Delete Aged Cloud Management Gateway Traffic Data
Delete Aged Distribution Point Usage Stats
